statements: DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND user_preference->>'theme' = 'dark';
DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND interaction_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE favorite_sport = 'Football' AND notification_enabled = true
DELETE FROM ARSportsGame WHERE game_type = 'Football' AND game_score > 50;
DELETE FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 100 AND preference_value = 'football';
DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'like';
DELETE FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM Leaderboard WHERE user_id = 200 AND game_level = 5;
